markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, when what exists, because of grasping what and insisting on what, does the view arise: ‘A Realized One doesn’t exist after death’?” …

SN.24.17. Hoticanacahotitathāgatosutta (“A Realized One Both Exists and Doesn’t Exist”)
